titleStmt.title: Rinaldo and Armida a tragedy, as it is acted at the theatre in Little-Lincoln's-Inn-Fields / written by Mr. Dennis.
titleStmt.author: Dennis, John, 1657-1734.
Tasso, Torquato, 1544-1595. Gerusalemme liberata.
Eccles, John, d. 1735.

notesStmt.note: Based on: La Gerusalemme liberata / Torquato Tasso. According to Genest, an opera rather than a tragedy.
Reproduction of original in University of Michigan Library.
